channel.title: Calculating my grade average - Help please
channel.description: Alright so say in Science all my marks (percentage) were in the mid 60s. My final mark in science being 66%, now suppose I got 99.5% on the Science exam with 20-40% of my final mark. Would that drastically change my 66%?

item.title: Calculating my grade average - Help please
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Just remember this: People with lower grades can use high test grades to their advantage but a person with a high grade will see little movement in their grade regardless of how well they did on their test.

Read full topic
item.source: Calculating my grade average - Help please

item.title: Calculating my grade average - Help please
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

lmao, if its 40% then u were .1 away from being the lowest B possible owned

Read full topic
item.source: Calculating my grade average - Help please

item.title: Calculating my grade average - Help please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

With the exam worth 20%:
(.66)(.8) + (.995)(.2) = 72.7

With the exam worth 40%:
(.66)(.6) + (.995)(.4) = 79.4

Read full topic
item.source: Calculating my grade average - Help please

item.title: Calculating my grade average - Help please
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

If you got 99.5 on your final exam, your grade would be between 72 and 79.

Read full topic

[/quote]
